short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support for the 3l keyboard layout on Chrome OS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables support for the 3l keyboard layout in Chrome OS. You can find out more information about the 3l keyboard layout at this URL: https://github.com/jackrosenthal/threelayout

This extension is only for Chrome OS. It will not function on Chrome for Windows/Linux/Mac.

Once installed, go to "Languages and Input" in the Chrome OS settings to enable the keyboard.

Due to limitations in what Chrome extensions are capable of, the keyboard layout will not function on the login screen.
